description: Control Home Assistant lights, climate, media, locks, and scenes using natural language. Discover devices, trigger automations, send notifications, and check home status from one place. Sync lights to music with Aurora effects and get smart maintenance insights for energy and device health.

hassToken.description: Long-lived access token for Home Assistant

capabilities.name: lights_control
capabilities.description: Control lights in Home Assistant. List all lights, get state of a specific light, turn lights on with brightness/color settings, or turn lights off.

capabilities.name: climate_control
capabilities.description: Control climate devices (thermostats, AC) in Home Assistant. List devices, get state, set HVAC mode, temperature, or fan mode.

capabilities.name: list_devices
capabilities.description: List all available Home Assistant devices with optional filtering by domain, area, or floor.

capabilities.name: cover_control
capabilities.description: Control covers (blinds, curtains, garage doors). Open, close, stop, or set position.

capabilities.name: media_player_control
capabilities.description: Control media players. Play, pause, stop, volume control, and source selection.

capabilities.name: fan_control
capabilities.description: Control fans. Turn on/off, set speed percentage, preset modes, oscillation.

capabilities.name: lock_control
capabilities.description: Control locks. Lock, unlock, or open (for locks that support unlatching).

capabilities.name: vacuum_control
capabilities.description: Control robot vacuums. Start, pause, stop, return to dock, clean spot, locate.

capabilities.name: alarm_control
capabilities.description: Control alarm systems. Arm (home, away, night), disarm, or trigger alarms.

capabilities.name: automation
capabilities.description: Manage Home Assistant automations. List all automations, toggle on/off, or trigger manually.

capabilities.name: scene
capabilities.description: Manage and activate Home Assistant scenes.

capabilities.name: notify
capabilities.description: Send notifications through Home Assistant notification services.

capabilities.name: system_info
capabilities.description: Get information about the MCP server including version and Home Assistant connection status.
